LanguageData.GI_Apparel.label: Giant Apparel
LanguageData.GI_Headgear.label: Giant headgear
LanguageData.GI_GiantRags.label: Giant Bodyrag
LanguageData.GI_GiantRags.description: A patched clothing that covers a Giant. It is still better than nothing.
LanguageData.GI_Clothes.label: Giant Clothes
LanguageData.GI_Clothes.description: Finely crafted Giant apparel. Looks like body size was taken to consideration.
LanguageData.GI_Brigandine.label: Giant Brigandine
LanguageData.GI_Brigandine.description: A huge, sturdy leather armor with metal plate reinforcements.
LanguageData.GI_Shadehat.label: Giant Shadehat
LanguageData.GI_Shadehat.description: It protects a Giant's head from searing sunlight.
LanguageData.GI_Potlid.label: Giant Potlid
LanguageData.GI_Potlid.description: A lid of a pot used by tiny people to prepare a feast. It happens to fit perfectly on Giants.
LanguageData.GI_Thrumboskull.label: Thrumbo Skull
LanguageData.GI_Thrumboskull.description: A skull of great thrumbo induces both awe and fear.
LanguageData.GI_MaskandhelmF.label: Female Face Helm
LanguageData.GI_MaskandhelmF.description: A gigantic helm with a mask. It features a beautiful face of a female Giant.
LanguageData.GI_MaskandhelmM.label: Male Face Helm
LanguageData.GI_MaskandhelmM.description: A gigantic helm with a mask. It features a beautiful face of a male Giant.
LanguageData.GI_Insignia.label: Giant Insignia
LanguageData.GI_Insignia.description: Many Giants seek tiny people's insignia to decorate themselves.
LanguageData.GI_Bonepauldron.label: Giant Bone Trinkets
LanguageData.GI_Bonepauldron.description: Hard bones and sharp tusks brings out the primal fear from whom they face.
LanguageData.GI_Booty.label: Giant Loots
LanguageData.GI_Booty.description: Looted metal goods from tiny people have shown effective in providing extra protection.
LanguageData.GI_Pauldron.label: Giant Pauldron
LanguageData.GI_Pauldron.description: Gigantic and majestic shoulder armor piece for Giants.
